institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Global Job Support Business Rules/Article 17 (Support for Training Course Operation)
contents: Article 17 (Support for training course operation) ① The chairman may support necessary expenses within the budget for overseas employment training courses selected pursuant to Article 14. ② The chairman may recruit or recruit training candidates jointly with the operating institution. When selecting trainees, preference may be given to vulnerable groups such as young people due to employment difficulties., ③ The chairman may allow trainees to bear a portion of the costs incurred in operating the training course. In this case, the costs borne by the training recipient are collected by the operating institution.
